name: ST0F_02C.BIN
original:
<DIALOG2>You're from out of
town, aren't you?
Are you a Digger?<NEXT>Don't worry--every-
one here is very
friendly!<NEXT>You may not know
your way around
yet, but you'll<NEXT>find that you'll
get along just fine!<NEXT>Please just
remember to observe
the law and you<NEXT>won't have any
problems.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>We are currently
handling evacuation
applications.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I've got to take
care of my
evacuation<NEXT>procedures before
it's too late![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I can't sit still--<NEXT>I'm so worried
about those pirates
coming![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>You're quite the
Digger, aren't you?<NEXT>Keep up the good
work![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>We are currently
processing post-<NEXT>evacuation
relocation forms.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I've got to finish
my relocation<NEXT>procedures and get
back home![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I heard those
pirates are hiding in
the Clozer Woods...<NEXT>I hope the police
can take care of them![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I'd like to fill
out a relocation
form...<NEXT>Where do I do
that?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>If you'd like to
make a contribution
to the restoration<NEXT>fund, please see
the mayor--she's on
the second floor.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>We are still
processing
relocation forms.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Oh, so this is where
you turn in your
relocation forms, eh?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I wonder if those
pirates have really
given up...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>If you'd like to
make a contribution
to the restoration<NEXT>fund, please see
the mayor--she's on
the second floor.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>It looks like most
people have come<NEXT>back from the
evacuation
shelters...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Well, now that my
forms're all filled
out,<NEXT>I guess it's
time to go home![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I bet those pirates'll
show up at the ruins
on the lake next!<NEXT>I mean, it makes
sense, right?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>The mayor seems to
be worried over all<NEXT>the disasters
happening lately...<NEXT>MegaMan! Please
help the mayor![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Finally, every-
thing's back to
normal...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Excuse me...I'd
like to apply for a
marriage license...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I don't know...<NEXT>There's something
dignified about a
government building,<NEXT>don't you think?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>We're opening a
restaurant,<NEXT>and we need to
fill out some
forms...<NEXT>That's what Miss
Tron said![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Everyone here is
very friendly!<NEXT>You may not know
your way around
yet, but you'll<NEXT>find that you'll
get along just
fine!<NEXT>Please just
remember to observe
the law and you<NEXT>won't have any
problems.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>The mayor might
know something
about the Main Gate.<NEXT>She's upstairs if
you'd like to talk
with her.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>We've started
evacuation
procedures again.<NEXT>Things are going
to get busy![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>First thing that
happens after I get<NEXT>home is this big
earthquake!<NEXT>Guess I've got to
evacuate again![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>What about all
those little cats<NEXT>that live around
the Main Gate?<NEXT>I wonder what's
going to happen to
them?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I'm sorry--you
can't see the mayor<NEXT>without an
appointment...<NEXT>Just kidding! You
can go on in,
MegaMan![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8It's a shiny
leather sofa.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>A Sub-Gate has
appeared in the middle
of the city...<NEXT>The citizens are
getting very nervous.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>All I do all day
is process
evacuation forms...<NEXT>Maybe I'll
evacuate myself...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I was going to
evacuate!<NEXT>But then I changed
my mind!<NEXT>Wait! Maybe I
should...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I can't remember a
time when so much
happened at once...<NEXT>'It never rains but
it pours,' they say![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I heard something
happened over by
the Main Gate...<NEXT>You're our only
hope, MegaMan--<NEXT>we're all
counting on you![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I thought about
evacuating, but...<NEXT>I changed my mind
once I saw the
mayor was staying![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Yep! I made up my
mind! I'm staying!<NEXT>I was born here
and raised here--I
ain't running!<NEXT>So there![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I figure whatever
happens, happens--<NEXT>there's not much
we can do about
it...<NEXT>We just have to
live one day at a
time...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Thanks to your
help, we've been
able to fully<NEXT>restore the city...
Thank you for every-
thing![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]
